setSortFlag

public void setSortFlag(int sortFlag)
Sets the sort flag for this CLM. This defines how the CLM will be sorted by default.

Parameters:
sortFlag - The sort flag to set

Uses the sort flag to determine how to sort the list each time it is updated.

Parameters:

sortCommentsByPicture

public void sortCommentsByPicture(Location loc)
Sorts comments by picture and location. Comments with pictures appear at the top sorted by proximity and the same with the ones with not pictures after.

Parameters:
loc - Location for proximity sorting

sortAllCommentsByDate

Sorts all comments in the CLM by their date.
